unnormalised: As per the MHRD circular dated 20/07/2023, it's important to note that eligibility for the PM Poshan Shakti Nirman scheme requires Aadhar card verification. Students scoring above 75% in Class 10 exams may also qualify for additional benefits under the revised guidelines of the Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao Yojana, according to the MoWCD announcement on 15/08/2024. Parents should consult the district education officer for further details regarding application procedures and deadlines.
normalised: As per the M-H-R-D circular dated twentieth july two thousand and twenty three, its important to note that eligibility for the P-M Poshan Shakti Nirman scheme requires Aadhar card verification. Students scoring above seventy five percent in Class ten exams may also qualify for additional benefits under the revised guidelines of the Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao Yojana, according to the M-o-W-C-D announcement on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four. Parents should consult the district education officer for further details regarding application procedures and deadlines.
